dlgPart.npc_text: Beyond the portal lies a strange dim chamber, crowded with long dead devices. The centerpiece of the dusty apparatuses is a humongous glass tank, like a giant spider in a web of cables linking it to the other machines. An enormous door, about big enough for a charioteer and a team of two, gives access to the tank.

The water is an unhealthy green and fungus rimes the glass. Something white, about the size of an apple, is pressed against the glass. You step back when you realize the object is an eyeball, and the bloated mass around it was once a face, of sorts, the face of something not human. It must have floated here for centuries, yet persists, undecayed.
